description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Bundt Cake With Chocolate Gold Sprinkle Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chocolate Bundt Cake With Chocolate Gold Sprinkle Glaze
name: Chocolate Bundt Cake With Chocolate Gold Sprinkle Glaze Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For the glaze, place chocolate in a bowl. Heat cream in a small saucepan over medium heat until cream just comes to the boil. Pour over chocolate. Stand for 2 minutes. Stir until chocolate has melted. Add butter and stir until combined. Stand for 15 minutes or until slightly thickened. Pour over cold cake. Transfer to a serving plate. Sprinkle with gold powder and glitter stars, if using.
